Articles.Content:
So, I boot up KSP with a bunch of mods, start a new save (this is my first save file on this copy), and am greeted with this "lovely" sight at a horrible framerate:

Spoiler

I have no idea why, or how, but what I do know is what mods I'm using, and that there aren't any logs, unfortunately.

Spoiler

 Flight Manager for Reusable Stages (FMRS) Continued (FMRSContinued 1.2.5)
[x] Science! (xScience v5.10)

Oh, and To Boldly Go.

Please help.
I used to have a ton of issues like this before (the main menu would be eye-bleeding white and neon pink). All I can say is quit the game and open it back up.

Just now, MrWalrus123 said:

I used to have a ton of issues like this before (the main menu would be eye-bleeding white and neon pink). All I can say is quit the game and open it back up.

I'll reboot and see if that fixes it, but before, entering the VAB/SPH and exiting it didn't help. I'll let you know what the result is after I do it.

6 minutes ago, Linventor said:

I'll reboot and see if that fixes it, but before, entering the VAB/SPH and exiting it didn't help. I'll let you know what the result is after I do it.

um... I found the problem... as it turns out, the game is functioning perfectly, but with some interesting results. See for yourself. I started laughing like crazy when I saw this.
